ygData.subject: Re: New Troll SK
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t touch my Intelligence and couldn t cast my pet until level 11 and you know what, SO WHAT!  Not to mention our pets bite and usually get us into
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't touch my Intelligence and couldn't cast my pet until level 11 and
you know what, SO WHAT! Not to mention our pets bite and usually get us
into trouble. I have only cast my pet 4 times and I'm past level 15. We
are 3/4 warrior and 1/4 Necro. We're not supposed to be good at it. Until
you get to level 22 the best spells that I have been ussing are Invis to
Undead, Clinging Darkness(oh so great for fast creatures that tend to run
when hp is low), Fear isn't too bad but I rarely use it, Shadow Step si
great for fleeing, and Locate Corpse for yourself or for anyone you want to
help out. Just keep in mine that your pet is usually half your level and is
usually a speed bump to the creature you fight. Just some of my thoughts.

Grumbel
Troll Shadow Knight
Xegony
